list_translation_mean.translate_mean: mũi đất nhỏ chạy ra biển

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: eject saliva forcibly from one's mouth, sometimes as a gesture of contempt or anger.
(of a fire or something being cooked) emit small bursts of sparks or hot fat with a series of short, explosive noises.
put a spit through (meat) in order to roast it over an open fire.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: I spitted the squirrel meat and turned it over the flames
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Tôi đã chia sẻ thịt sóc và lật nó lên ngọn lửa

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: saliva, typically that which has been ejected from a person's mouth.
a long, thin metal rod pushed through meat in order to hold and turn it while it is roasted over an open fire.
a narrow point of land projecting into the sea.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: a narrow spit of land shelters the bay
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: một nhổ nước bọt hẹp của vịnh vịnh

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a layer of earth whose depth is equal to the length of the blade of a spade.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: break up the top spit with a fork
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Chia nhổ hàng đầu với một ngã ba
